q1.description: $L = \{x \ | \ x \ is \ a \ positive \ even \ integer\}$
q1.question: Is $L$ closed under addition?

q2.description: $L = \{x \ | \ x \ is \ a \ positive \ even \ integer\}$
q2.question: Is $L$ closed under multiplication?

q3.description: $L = \{x \ | \ x \ is \ a \ positive \ even \ integer\}$. Think about 4 - 10
q3.question: Is $L$ closed under subtraction?

q4.description: $L = \{x \ | \ x \ is \ a \ positive \ even \ integer\}$
q4.question: Is $L$ closed under division?
